OriginalSource.Creator: Terese Winslow
OriginalSource.SourceFilename: SigmoidoscopyFemalePatient FP V_ Provider FP VI.2
OriginalSource.Comment: Adjusted the scope in the inset so that it extends only into the lower part of the colon and changed the color of the scope from blue to green so that it matches the scope color in the main figure
Made patient female and darkened skin tone of patient and provider
Made the figure look more male.
Added nipples to indicate that it is the front of the person; moved the title from the inset to the top of the illustration.
Added new copyright information and label names.

ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Sigmoidoscopy; drawing shows a sigmoidoscope inserted through the anus and rectum and into the sigmoid colon. An inset shows a patient lying on a table having a sigmoidoscopy.

Captions.MediaCaption: Sigmoidoscopy. A thin, lighted tube is inserted through the anus and rectum and into the lower part of the colon to look for abnormal areas.

ProcessingStatus.Comment: Updated image to SigmoidoscopyFemalePatient FP V_ Provider FP VI.1.jpg
